ComicInfo.Penciller: Bill Black,Eric Coile,Mark Heike,Scott Nemmers,Wild Bill Black
ComicInfo.Summary: Celebrate the 20Th Anniversary of AC Comics with it's most successful title, Femforce!! As Dr. Mara delves into Synn's diminishing/expanding intellect, fantastic forces snatch the Girl From LSD into the far-flung future where, if you can believeit, "Synn Saves The Solar System!" Written and drawn by Bill Black, and guest-starring The Starmasters!!! After sucking soul energy from countless lost beings, the monstrous Kraken awakens and rises from the deep sea depths to ravage the planet. Only Nightveil, sorceress supreme, and She-Cat, feline cat goddess, stand in its path to block its conquest in the cataclysmic climax to "The Curse of the Kraken" by Tony Bruno and Scott Nemmers. Also, Eric Coile's masterful "Cave Girl", originally scheduled for Cave Girl #2. What if legendary actress/pin-up queen Irish McCalla had played the part of Cave Girl? Plus- an additional 16-page section that includes scads of sexy pin-ups by Ed Coutts, Brad Gorby, Heike & Black, Eddy Newell and others, and the textual account of how Bill Black created Synn and the Femforce, profusely illustrated with art and photos!! Every copy signed by Bill Black and Mark Heike!! As mentioned elsewhere, due to a printing gaff, only a few of these books will be available here as back issues. All of the "standard edition" versions of this book, sold through the comics distributors, have sold out and are unavailable. We just had parts to assemble a few of these Special Anniversary Editions, so this is the only version of this book that will now be available- and when these are sold, FF 118 will no longer be available in ANY format. We may someday reprint this material in another format, but that will not be in the foreseeable future-so if you want this book, act now. 60 pages, black and white with color covers, standard comic book format.
ComicInfo.Title: Synn Saves The Solar System!
ComicInfo.Writer: Bill Black,Eric Coile,Scott Nemmers,Tony Bruno,Wild Bill Black
